message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $160 is a more reasonable price for this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another concession, but I think $155 is the minimum I can accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $152 is the absolute lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $148?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $149 is the absolute lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $147?
